name: imre
description:
Welcome to the transformative marketing agency of today. imre is a marketing communications agency with expertise in social, digital, creative, public relations and paid media. We lead the market in modern content, siloless campaigns and the development of meaningful interactions and experiences. Our clients include AstraZeneca, California Pizza Kitchen, Dickies, Kwikset, John Deere, Patagonia, Penn Mutual, Pepsico, PowerBar, STIHL, T. Rowe Price and Zoetis.
We have offices in New York City, Los Angeles, Baltimore and Raleigh.
